page.title: 03RELIGION
page.content: There are no churches in our area. Most of the area is in the Parish of Ceres. The church is Chusch of Scotland. The parish church in Ceres has a Sunday School for local children which meets in Craigrothie Village Hall. At present it has 23 children. Children attend from the age of three until they go to Secondary School usually at twelve. The Sunday School has 1 leader and 2 helpers. There has been a Sunday School in Craigrothie since 1896. The rental of the Hall is paid from Church Funds and the offering given each week by the children goes to the Mission and Services Fund of the Church which sends bibles overseas.
